H3.text: who is michael j fox's wife. Tracy Pollan

A4.text: Fox met his wife, Tracy Pollan, when she played the role of his girlfriend, Ellen, on Family Ties.

A5.text: The couple married on July 16, 1988, at West Mountain Inn in Arlington, Vermont.
